```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)
library(here)

```

```{r}
stl_lead <- read_delim(here::here("data", 
                                "stl_blood_lead.csv"), 
                     delim = ";")
# delim reads ";" as columns/separated
stl_lead
# clean_names() not especially useful for this.
```

```{r}
stl_lead_prop <- stl_lead %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(prop_white = (white / totalPop) * 100)
```
